Job Description: Education: B.E. Computer Science/IT degree (or any other engineering discipline) Experience: 7 + years Shift Time: 2 pm to 11 pmPosition Requirements: Hands on experience in Java 8 and 11 (lambda, functional interfaces, JEP 323)  Frameworks: Spring Boot (2.2.X and later) with Spring Cloud (Hoxton or at least Greenwich) Well versed with REST API design standards Experience in working on ElasticSearch, Docker, Kubernetes and Kafka Strong skills in SQL (Cockroach or Postgres), JPA, Hibernate, Level2 caching Experience in Redis, Stream, gRPC, Spring Reactor and Istio is good to have
